/Applications/Xcode.app/Contents/Developer/Toolchains/XcodeDefault.xctoolchain/usr/bin/c++   -Wall -std=c++11 -stdlib=libc++ -g -framework OpenGL -framework Cocoa -framework IOKit -framework CoreVideo  CMakeFiles/hello_shader.dir/src/hello_shader.o CMakeFiles/hello_shader.dir/src/viewer.o CMakeFiles/hello_shader.dir/src/interface.o CMakeFiles/hello_shader.dir/src/gl_support.o  -o hello_shader  -framework AGL -framework OpenGL /usr/lib/libGLEW.dylib -lglfw3
